TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers

Class ChatController

  • java.lang.Object
    • TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers.ChatController

  • public class ChatController
extends java.lang.Object
    controls the flow when the user is engaging in a chat session

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChatController(BabblerBase babblerBase, ChatScreen chatScreen, AppChats chats, AppContacts contacts, ConnectionController connectionController) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actuallySendChatSessionMessage(AppChatSessionMessage message, java.lang.String userName)
      This actually sends the message.
      void incomingChatMessage(AppMessage message, boolean currentScreenIsChatScreen)
      Called when there is an incoming chat session message Retrieves the relevant chat if it exists, or creates one if the relevant user is a contact passes the message to the relevant chat to handle if the relevant chat session is the current chat session, and teh current screen is the chat scren, then the chatscreen re loads
      void messageSent(AppChatSessionMessage message)
      This is called when a message is successfully sent, so that the view can update according to this information.
      void sendChatSessionMessage(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String userName)
      This is called by ChatScren when the onSendNewMessageEvent occurs Sends the message to the active chat, and reloads the chat screen

    • Method Detail

      • sendChatSessionMessage

        public void sendChatSessionMessage(java.lang.String message,
                                   java.lang.String userName)
        This is called by ChatScren when the onSendNewMessageEvent occurs Sends the message to the active chat, and reloads the chat screen
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send
        userName - the username of the user to send the message to.

      • actuallySendChatSessionMessage

        public void actuallySendChatSessionMessage(AppChatSessionMessage message,
                                           java.lang.String userName)
        This actually sends the message. It is handled by contactController so that it can be ensured that there is a connection first.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send
        userName - the username of the user to send the message to

      • messageSent

        public void messageSent(AppChatSessionMessage message)
        This is called when a message is successfully sent, so that the view can update according to this information.
        Parameters:
        message - the message that has been sent

      • incomingChatMessage

        public void incomingChatMessage(AppMessage message,
                                boolean currentScreenIsChatScreen)
        Called when there is an incoming chat session message Retrieves the relevant chat if it exists, or creates one if the relevant user is a contact passes the message to the relevant chat to handle if the relevant chat session is the current chat session, and teh current screen is the chat scren, then the chatscreen re loads
        Parameters:
        message - the message that has been recieved
        currentScreenIsChatScreen - this is true if the current screen is the chat screen, or false otherwise

      • setOnChangeScreen

        public void setOnChangeScreen(ChangeScreen changeScreen)

      • setOnExitMUC

        public void setOnExitMUC(GetMUCEvent exitMUC)
